name: Magic Princess Beauty Spa
description:
This princess wan't make up for her weekend trip. Do you have the needed creativity and style to make the nice look stunning in one of the best dress up games? We created a stunning style makeover game with spa salon makeup and makeover. Makeover games like this one will let you explore your creativity and showcase your fashion opinions.

SHOW HOW CREATIVE YOU CAN BE WITH CLOTHES AND MAKE UP

There are a lot of makeup and creativity included in the game. If you love playing makeover games, then you are at right place because we have created the right tools for everyone. Amazing clothes and makeup selection will leave you stunned and make you want to enjoy this star games for girls even more.

SHOW YOUR FASHION AND STYLE SENSE

There are many options with different style for dress up games but have you imagined.

FEATURES:
========
- HD stunning graphics.
- There are so many different tools and different levels.
- Supported all device.
- Easy to play.

So are you ready for help? Play and Enjoy....
